text: Pisania fasciculata is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Pisaniidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Indian Ocean off the Mascarene Basin. ==References== * Kilburn, R.N. & Rippey, E. (1982) Sea Shells of Southern Africa. Macmillan South Africa, Johannesburg, xi + 249 pp. * Drivas, J.; Jay, M. (1987). Coquillages de La Réunion et de l'Île Maurice. Collection Les Beautés de la Nature. Delachaux et Niestlé: Neuchâtel. . 159 pp. * Kilburn R.N., Marais J.P. & Fraussen K. (2010) Buccinidae. pp. 16–52, in: Marais A.P. & Seccombe A.D. (eds), Identification guide to the seashells of South Africa. Volume 1. Groenkloof: Centre for Molluscan Studies. 376 pp. ==External links== * Category:Pisaniidae Category:Gastropods described in 1846
title: Pisania fasciculata
